alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Worcester and southeastern Middlesex Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Upton, or near Milford, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Framingham, Waltham, Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Natick, Milford, Acton, Hudson, Westborough, Grafton, Concord, Sudbury, Ashland, Northbridge, Hopkinton, Northborough, Holliston, Uxbridge, Millbury and Wayland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
